scene.name: intro
scene.line: Here it is. A beauty, wouldn't you say? It's an antique, you know.

Why, it's an adding machine. This is where we come for our daily ritual: to calculate the day's interest and repayment according to The Formula. I usually do so at the beginning of my shift, so I know how many hours I need in order to keep up.
Yes, I believe you'll do well here, sir. Happy to have you. Congratulations! You're hired.
It's customary here to start each day with a `shift drink`. Let's make it special. Mark the occasion. This is the top-shelf stuff, now! Single barrel!
